Posts.Content: May 10, 2015 09:44AM Tewilson71 wrote: I opted to have a double mastectomy after being diagnosed with IDC Stage IIB in right. After surgery the pathology revealed DCIS all through my left breast which had gone undetected in both MRIs. So glad I decided to remove both!
Posts.Title: IDC IIB zzlady ruthbru
